summary: Top-notch french restaurant owner Monsieur Septime is involved into crime when one of his famous guests disappears.
cast: Louis de Funès|Bernard Blier|Maria-Rosa Rodriguez|Venantino Venantini|Juan Ramírez|Noël Roquevert|Folco Lulli|Yves Arcanel|René Berthier|Albert Dagnant|Robert Dalban|Eugene Deckers|Robert Destain|Bernard Dumaine|Jacques Dynam|Guy Grosso|Jacques Legras|Roger Lumont|Henri Marteau|Michel Modo|Max Montavon|Paul Préboist|Julian Ramirez|Pierre Roussel|France Rumilly|Frédéric Santaya|Pierre Tornade|Marc Arian|André Badin|Jack Berard|René Bouloc|Roger Caccia|Adrien Cayla-Legrand|Olivier De Funès|Raoul Delfosse|Jean Droze|Yves Elliot|Paul Faivre|Henri-Jacques Huet|Jean Ozenne|Maurice Risch
title: El gran restaurante
